member.name: T:Newtonsoft.Json.InterfaceToConcreteConverter`2
member.summary: This convert can be sued on any interface definition to instruct the JSON serializer to use a specific concrete class when de-serializing the instance.
member.typeparam: The Type that was serialized into the JSON text.
The Tyep that specifies the class that will be created.

member.name: M:Newtonsoft.Json.InterfaceToConcreteConverter`2.CanConvert(System.Type)
member.summary: Determines whether this instance can convert the specified object type.
member.returns: Returns true if this instance can convert the specified object type, false otherwise.

member.name: P:Newtonsoft.Json.InterfaceToConcreteConverter`2.CanRead
